Service Details: - Provides education and information through our Tenant Infoline, website, social media, multilingual resources and legal workshops- When appropriate, will provide direct advocacy to disadvantaged tenants by negotiating resolutions with problem landlords or providing representation at RTB dispute resolution hearings
